edu.stanford.nlp.mt.tune.optimizers

Class PowellOptimizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.stanford.nlp.mt.tune.optimizers.AbstractNBestOptimizer
      • edu.stanford.nlp.mt.tune.optimizers.PowellOptimizer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NBestOptimizer

    public class PowellOptimizer
extends AbstractNBestOptimizer
    Powell's Method A typical implementation - with details originally based on David Chiang's CMERT 0.5 (as distributed with Moses 1.5.8) This implementation appears to be based on that given in Press et al's Numerical Recipes (1992) pg. 417.
    Author:
    danielcer
